about_the_game:
Experience the short yet intense first-person 'survival horror-lite' game, PLASTOMORPHOSIS: FINAL CORRUPTION.

Investigate the aftermath of a dark energy surge and survive the reawakened horrors of the Plastomorphosis experiment.

THE GAMEPLAY

·      Genre Focus: First-person Survival Horror

·      Every shot counts — face off against twisted, horrific anti-human creatures while managing limited resources

·      Puzzles are simple at first glance, but their solutions require cunning and focus

·      Step into a bleak reality where dangerous, unforeseen consequences take control

 

THE STORY

A mysterious dark energy surge shatters the calm of the Government District, setting a resistance agent on a path toward a disturbing discovery — the Plastomorphosis experiment is far from over, and its consequences are more dangerous than ever.

The Re.Movers, a resistance movement against the Re. Surs (a peculiar dark energy), have tracked the surge to a mysterious source.

There, dark energy is being extracted via the Plastomorphosis procedure — either from many citizen victims (again!) or perhaps from one powerful individual who has absorbed more than anyone else.

The resistance suspects this might even lead to a breakthrough in the disappearance of Detective Jessie Sullivan, the only known survivor of the otherworld's dark energy incident eight years ago, who vanished without a trace.

 

Basil B., a skilled hacker and agent of the resistance, is dispatched to investigate. The trail leads to the Soldier of Sovereign’s dorm building, where an unusual spike in dark energy radiation was first detected.

His mission: find out what’s going on, uncover any traces of Sullivan, and if the nightmare of Plastomorphosis has returned — put an end to it once and for all.

 

The clock is ticking, and Basil must navigate a web of danger before the POWER of dark energy spirals out of CONTROL again.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains different horror themes, blood, gore (such as corpses), depictions of death, and violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 — 9th gen or better
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 or better;
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Performance: Full HD ~60 FPS; 16:9 (16:10) Monitor Recommended;
